SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.managers

Class StructureTypeManager

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.managers.StructureTypeManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDebuggable
@Singleton public final class StructureTypeManager extends Object implements IDebuggable
This class manages all StructureTypes. Before a type can be used, it will have to be registered here.
Author:
Pim

    • isRegistered

      public boolean isRegistered(StructureType structureType)
      Checks if an StructureType is enabled.
      Parameters:
      structureType - The StructureType to check.
      Returns:
      True if the StructureType is enabled, otherwise false.

    • getStructureType

      public Optional<StructureType> getStructureType(String typeName)
      Tries to get a StructureType from it name as defined by StructureType.getSimpleName(). This method is case-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      typeName - The name of the type.
      Returns:
      The StructureType to retrieve, if possible.

    • getStructureTypeFromFullName

      public Optional<StructureType> getStructureTypeFromFullName(@Nullable @Nullable String fullName)
      Tries to get a StructureType from its fully qualified name as defined by StructureType.getSimpleName(). This method is case-sensitive.
      Parameters:
      fullName - The fully qualified name of the type.
      Returns:
      The StructureType to retrieve, if possible.

    • isStructureTypeEnabled

      public boolean isStructureTypeEnabled(StructureType structureType)
      Checks if a StructureType is enabled or not. Disabled StructureTypes cannot be toggled or created.

      StructureTypes that are not registered, are disabled by definition.

      Parameters:
      structureType - The StructureType to check.
      Returns:
      True if this StructureType is both registered and enabled.

    • registerStructureType

      public void registerStructureType(StructureType structureType)
      Registers a StructureType.
      Parameters:
      structureType - The StructureType to register.

    • registerStructureType

      public void registerStructureType(StructureType structureType, boolean isEnabled)
      Registers a StructureType.
      Parameters:
      structureType - The StructureType to register.
      isEnabled - Whether this StructureType should be enabled or not. Default = true.

    • unregisterStructureType

      public void unregisterStructureType(StructureType structureType)
      Unregisters a structure type. Note that it does NOT remove it or its structures from the database and that after unregistering it, that won't be possible anymore either.

      Once unregistered, this type will be completely disabled and structures of this type cannot be used for anything.

      Parameters:
      structureType - The type to unregister.

    • setStructureTypeEnabled

      public void setStructureTypeEnabled(StructureType structureType, boolean isEnabled)
      Changes the status of a StructureType. If disabled, this type cannot be toggled or created.
      Parameters:
      structureType - The StructureType to enabled or disable.
      isEnabled - True to enable this StructureType (default), or false to disable it.

    • registerStructureTypes

      public void registerStructureTypes(List<StructureType> structureTypes)
      Registers a list of StructureTypes. See registerStructureType(StructureType).
      Parameters:
      structureTypes - The list of StructureTypes to register.

      Returns:
